Package.Description: The Windows Azure Training Course includes a comprehensive set of hands-on labs and videos that are designed to help you quickly learn how to use Windows Azure services and SQL Azure.
Package.Name: Demo Test Training Course

Overview.Description: The Windows Azure Training Course includes a comprehensive set of hands-on labs and videos that are designed to help you quickly learn how to use Windows Azure and SQL Azure.
Overview.Title: Windows Azure Training Course

Package.AudiencePrerequisites: Experience using Visual Studio and the .NET Framework

Group.Name: Prerequisites
Group.Description: The hands-on labs for this training course require the following prerequisite software to be installed and configured on your machine:

Prerequisite.Name: Windows Azure Tools for Microsoft Visual Studio 1.6
SQL Server Management Studio 2008 R2 Express Edition
SQL Server 2012 Business Intelligence Development Studio
Microsoft HPC Pack 2008 R2 Client Components
Microsoft HPC Pack 2008 R2 MS-MPI Redistributable Pack

Resource.Title: Windows Azure Team Blog
Resource.Description: Blog of the Windows Azure Team.

Unit.Description: Windows Azure is an internet-scale cloud computing and services platform hosted in Microsoft data centers, which provides an operating system and a set of developer services which can be used individually or together. It gives developers the choice to build web applications; applications running on connected devices, PCs, or servers; or hybrid solutions offering the best of both worlds. New or enhanced applications can be built using existing skills with the Visual Studio development environment and the .NET Framework. With its standards-based and interoperable approach, the services platform supports multiple internet protocols, including HTTP, REST, SOAP, and plain XML
Unit.Name: Windows Azure

Package.Feedback: To give feedback please write to azcfeed@microsoft.com
